# DATA LEVEL SETTING

Choose a signal range for movie recording.

| Option       | Description                                                                                   |
|--------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| VIDEO RANGE  | The signal range for 8-bit movies is limited to 16â€“235 and that for 10-bit movies to 64â€“940.  |
| FULL RANGE   | The signal ranges for 8-bit and 10-bit movies are respectively 0â€“255 and 0â€“1023.              |

## PHOTOMETRY

Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (ðŸ“– 106).

## FLICKERLESS S.S. SETTING

Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (ðŸ“– 176).

|---------|
| ON      |
| OFF     |
